duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and process owner change orders, back charges, and award analysis in Procore/Sage 300
Analyze and import commitments and subcontract change orders from Procore into Sage 300
Prepare and distribute all monthly job cost reports to the Project Managers and Senior Management
Prepare a close-out package for all completed jobs
Enter and analyze monthly owner requisitions into Sage 300/Procore
Enter job-related and miscellaneous cash receipts into Sage 300/Procore
Analyze and process the Procore subcontractor invoicing
File/scan all project related documentation into Procore and network drive
Train project managers on how to read and use Procore and Sage 300 job cost reports, train on the usage of Procore system and preparation of accounting forms
Assist in the annual audit of client with independent auditors

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
